radiographic_examinations.findings: Reduced kidney size observed during prenatal ultrasonography at 38 weeks.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Renal ultrasonography at age 8 months confirmed small kidneys (right, 3.8 cm; left, 4.1 cm) with diffusely increased echogenicity of the renal cortex.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral absence of peripheral retinal vessels and scarcity of vessels nasal to the disc.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Segmental and simultaneous filling of retinal vessels observed.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal-sized globes with attenuated optic nerves; near-absence of the optic chiasm; small optic tracts.
Absence of the central retinal vasculature bilaterally.
Small kidneys with diffusely increased echogenicity of the renal cortex and diminished cortico-medullary differentiation, consistent with renal dysplasia.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Spectral Doppler analysis showed high-resistance arterial flow in both main renal arteries.
